issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
We (temporarily) need to install DuckDB from github to avoid using their unity build. Our detection of that has been slightly off (e.g. https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4480088131?check_suite_focus=true isn't building from github) and we see sporadic time outs.

This changes that to hopefully always catch when we would install it and pre-install the github version
fields.summary: [R] [CI] Move where we install DuckDB from in CI
